mapper.sql: NumberLssue_Id, Outlets_Id, NumberLssue_Order, NumberLssue_Number, NumberLssue_End, NumberLssue_Up, NumberLssue_Remarks, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness
mapper.select: select NumberLssue_Id, Outlets_Id, NumberLssue_Order, NumberLssue_Number, NumberLssue_End, NumberLssue_Up, NumberLssue_Remarks, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.numberlssue where NumberLssue_Id = #{numberlssueId}

select NumberLssue_Id, Outlets_Id, NumberLssue_Order, NumberLssue_Number, NumberLssue_End, NumberLssue_Up, NumberLssue_Remarks, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.numberlssue limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.numberlssue(Outlets_Id, NumberLssue_Order, NumberLssue_Number, NumberLssue_End, NumberLssue_Up, NumberLssue_Remarks, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values (#{outletsId}, #{numberlssueOrder}, #{numberlssueNumber}, #{numberlssueEnd}, #{numberlssueUp}, #{numberlssueRemarks}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness})

insert into lms.numberlssue(Outlets_Id, NumberLssue_Order, NumberLssue_Number, NumberLssue_End, NumberLssue_Up, NumberLssue_Remarks, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.numberlssueOrder}, #{entity.numberlssueNumber}, #{entity.numberlssueEnd}, #{entity.numberlssueUp}, #{entity.numberlssueRemarks}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})

insert into lms.numberlssue(Outlets_Id, NumberLssue_Order, NumberLssue_Number, NumberLssue_End, NumberLssue_Up, NumberLssue_Remarks, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.numberlssueOrder}, #{entity.numberlssueNumber}, #{entity.numberlssueEnd}, #{entity.numberlssueUp}, #{entity.numberlssueRemarks}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})
on duplicate key update Outlets_Id = values(Outlets_Id) , NumberLssue_Order = values(NumberLssue_Order) , NumberLssue_Number = values(NumberLssue_Number) , NumberLssue_End = values(NumberLssue_End) , NumberLssue_Up = values(NumberLssue_Up) , NumberLssue_Remarks = values(NumberLssue_Remarks) , AddName = values(AddName) , AddTime = values(AddTime) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness)
mapper.update:
update lms.numberlssue
Outlets_Id = #{outletsId},
NumberLssue_Order = #{numberlssueOrder},
NumberLssue_Number = #{numberlssueNumber},
NumberLssue_End = #{numberlssueEnd},
NumberLssue_Up = #{numberlssueUp},
NumberLssue_Remarks = #{numberlssueRemarks},
AddName = #{addname},
AddTime = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
where NumberLssue_Id = #{numberlssueId}
